name: The Karate Kid
description: The Karate Kid is a video game published by LJN and developed by the Japanese company Atlus Co., Ltd for the NES. The gameplay loosely follows plot elements from the first and second Karate Kid films. Also on the same year, There was a fighting game(like International Karate) that was released on the Amiga and Atari ST by Microdeal.(The Karate Kid Part 2)
